about_the_game:
Strange rumors are spreading across the kingdom.


The kingdom of Iron Crown is in chaos. Its once peaceful and complacent inhabitants are on the brink of a civil war that threatens to destroy peace. After years of questionable decisions by the ruler, one last rumor is all that is needed to cut the tension: The king is long dead.



Play as a kind and quiet wolf who, when faced with this rumor, decides to embark on a journey to find out if the rumor is true… or not. Luckily, you won't be alone: a cast of charismatic characters will help you on your adventure and watch over your safety to prevent you from doing something crazy and dying in the attempt. But it won't all be pleasant…

Howdy! Do you see something handy, my boy?



Crowley, peddler (and charlatan).


Iron Crown mixes deck-building and tactics games with the roguelike genre, bringing together a unique fusion to create a challenge that is not just about defeating the enemy with brute force, but where strategy plays an important role.



Place your cards in the order you want them executed and progress to complete the scenario. As you progress, you will unlock upgrades to facilitate your next expedition towards the truth!



Because the king is alive… isn’t he?

name: Iron Crown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.2+ Compliant
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: Iron Crown is a randomly generated Turn-Based deck building with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following our fellow heroes on their journey players will find random elements to help them reach their randomly generated goal, discover secrets, and claim the Iron Crown.
